Text:
It always amazes me that seeds are available while the show is airing, or even hours before. Since I missed the first 20 minutes this week, I'm happy this is here so I I'll probably be able to watch the whole thing about the time it finishes airing.

Now if only I could get mp4s to stream to the PS3. As it is anything but AVI is useless to me except for watching on my crappy laptop.
@Llwynog you could always download a converter program to convert mp4 to avi. I use one called Converterlite.
OUaT airs an hour earlier in Atlantic Canada.
way too much effort to convert
You sir make me swoon omfg YAY!! I'm sooo happy that you are so current and upto date
@pecpop Then you are one lazy person. It takes about five minutes to convert, and there are dozens of free converters out there. I wonder how you handle things that really take effort?
